name: Made In Canada
description:
A short n' sweet visual novel styled game, made in a week for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1.

Theme: It Is Not Real
Estimated Playtime: 10 - 15 Minutes.

It's Generally Pleasant Outlook Hour down at the ambiguous beverage establishment (your favorite one!) and you've been invited out by your immediate social group for a round of drinks. You're all primed for a good evening, except--

You're the only one there without a date.

Naturally, you do the  most sensible thing and lie about having a long-distance girlfriend in Canada, who's totally real and super spicy. Now all you've gotta do is keep up the facade for the rest of the night...

Made by Harleorah, Mr. Squidgereen, Samaram, Vetlan, Lex & lachrymalLichen.
